item.title: Github labs
item.description:
Introduction

GitHub is a cloud platform for hosting IT projects and collaborative development, under the hood of which is the popular Git version control system, as well as a full-fledged social network for developers.

My projects

At the moment, many of my projects are at the planning stage or early development stage, in the future they will be published on my Github account. At the moment, all labs are located there, confirming my training and providing a basis for future development.
